Title: "Gedwards" WFC
Description: Girton & Medwards‚Äô College Football Club for women/NB people of all abilities. We play in the CUAFC league with matches and training weekly and socials throughout the year.

Title: Girton College Badminton Club
Description: We hold weekly casual sessions where everyone of all abilities is welcome to come and play, with rackets and shuttles provided! We also have a team competing in the college leagues for those who want to play more competitively.

Title: Girton Poker Society
Description: Play poker, tournaments etc

Title: Amnesty International
Description: Amnesty International is a global organisation fighting for human rights and the persecuted. Under the Cambridge-wide society, Girton Amnesty will engage with students and faculty with letter writing, petitions, and discussions. We hope to hold a few events this year, and eventually grow Amnesty into the fabric of our community.

Title: Girton College Music Society (GCMS)
Description: GCMS puts on weekly Sunday lunchtime concerts, informal open mic nights, and three big orchestral concerts per year. We also organise masterclasses and workshops and welcome anyone interested in music of any genre, regardless of standard/ability!

Title: Girton College Boat Club
Description: Compete in collegiate rowing races across Cambridge including Bumps, regular socials with other colleges every 2-4 weeks, and everyone has a bloomin good time üòÅ

Title: ZYP
Description: ZYP is a friendly and relaxed society running weekly (alternating) zumba, yoga and pilates classes for all abilities! The classes are student led and completely free and society members are free to choose which classes they attend (e.g., if you only want to do Zumba that's absolutely fine).

Title: Girton TV & Cake Society
Description: Meet twice a term to watch TV and eat cake

Title: Girton Film Society
Description: Girton Film Society provides a friendly and stimulating environment to appreciate, discuss and engage with films as an art form. Every week we propose a selection of films, ranging from classic to independent movies, according to themes and we meet to watch and discuss the most voted one. Besides college screenings, we also organise socials and cinema outings in town, e.g. at the Arts Picturehouse. Come and join us, no matter if you are a cinephile, a film newbie or you just want to have a fun evening!

Title: Girton Amateur Dramatics Society (GADS)
Description: Arguably the oldest society in college, GADS puts on multiple shows in college every year, from our student-written Freshers' Musical and Pantos to the summer Shakespeare in the garden. We're friendly, chill and super laidback and we love to have a laugh with as many undergrads as possible.

Title: Girton College Mixed Water Polo
Description: We play in the water polo college team! It's a great way to get involved with low-level friendly water sports

Title: Purple Squirrels Ultimate Frisbee
Description: We are a mixed ultimate frisbee team open to anyone and we play in the university college league. The matches are most weekends and are very relaxed (and are usually accompanied with half time Pimms!)

Title: Pirton RFC
Description: Pembroke and Girton's low stress/high reward rugby team. Division 1's finest providers of jou√©. A.k.a le men, but actually nice guys. Feel free to set any of us a message and we'd love to have a chat :). Training: 4-6pm Thursdays at Grange road. Games: Saturdays. Socials: always.

Title: Girton FemSoc
Description: Femsoc is a space where we discuss current, important feminist issues. Our sessions range from informative discussion sessions to social events where we watch films/do arts and crafts. We publish a termcard on our social media platforms each term, so check us out and find out what we have going on!

Title: Girton College Ladies Netball
Description: Ladies netball is nice environment open to all abilities. We play weekly matches against other colleges and throw socials together with our Mixed team.

Title: Girton College Mixed Hockey
Description: We play matches every Sunday in a combined team with Gonville and Caius. We have no training, it is very chill mixed hockey playing and a great way to meet people from a different college!

Title: Girton College Table Tennis Club
Description: Restored post-pandemic, GCTTC are looking to bring table tennis glory to Girton once again! We are open to everyone and play in the termly inter-college league.

Title: Girton College Islamic Society (Girton ISOC)
Description: We are aimed at bringing together the Muslim community of Girton College to meet up and socialise based on our shared faith. We have in the past organised brunches, games nights and movie nights.

Title: Girton College Chess Club
Description: Throughout term, we meet regularly in schlub for some fun evenings of casual chess playing. We welcome chess enthusiasts of all playing levels and abilities! Towards the end of Michaelmas we will hopefully also put together a team to compete in the Lent term intercollegiate league.

Title: Girton College Ice Skating Club
Description: We are open to absolutely all abilities and aim to provide fun, active and inclusive events for all Girton College members, from disco nights to weekend group skates!

Title: Girton College Tennis Club
Description: A friendly, open to all society, that competes in the inter-college tennis leagues! Previously, we have just been playing matches, but we are hoping to have a weekly hitting session on the Girton courts this year, that anyone can join! Times and updates about this will be on our Facebook page.

Title: Girton College Mixed Netball
Description: We are Girton's Netball Team, one of the most popular societies in Girton. We host weekly games, big socials and you'll have a great time.

Title: Girton Poetry Group
Description: A warm and friendly group of amateur poet enthusiasts who sit round a fire, drink wine and read each other‚Äôs poems :) Everyone is welcome, no matter ability or experience, no pressure to write or even read, just a chance to enjoy the company of other word obsessed Girtonians! Xx

Title: Girton College Law Society
Description: The Girton Law Society offers career, social, and mooting events tailored to our members! We welcome both non-law and law students interested in a career in law or just curious about all that law has to offer! Follow us on our social media and come along to our next event..!

Title: Girton Medical and Veterinary Society
Description: GMVS is a collection of medics and vets across 6 years. Besides providing academic support, we also regularly hold talks and socials which are open to all. If you have any questions, feel free to contact us as we are always happy to help :)

Title: Cloud Leopards Mixed Lacrosse
Description: We play matches against other colleges every weekend alongside training sessions throughout term. We have multiple socials per term which have in the past included pub golf, pub crawls, club nights and non drinking socials too. Beginners always welcome!

Title: Girton College Probability and Statistics Society
Description: We have research projects studying the statistical and probability distributions for luck-based games, and game theory based strategies for other games.

Title: Girton Debates Union
Description: Debates Soc is a great space for all those interested in current affairs, public speaking, making key connections, and widening general awareness. We aim to have debates weekly, alongside speakers and many socials! No experience in debating is necessary and we welcome everyone no matter how much or little you would like to speak. Check out our social media for updates!

Title: Girton College Bingo Society
Description: We hold up to 3 events per term where everyone is invited to play bingo! Whether you‚Äôve never played before or are a seasoned professional, join us for an extravaganza. Each event is themed and in collaboration with a different Girton society. We also tend to work closely with the Social Hub to produce specialty drinks for our events, as well as with many staff members on our social media. Entry is free for all and lots of prizes are up for grabs! Bingo Society is about bringing everyone together, making new friends and playing some light-hearted bingo! For more information follow our Instagram or email (girtonbingosoc@gmail.com).

Title: Girton Finance and Consulting Society
Description: Description: Student-run organisation providing opportunities and mentorship for Girtonians interested in finance and consulting. Events will include a market watch tournament, workshops on CVs and spring weeks, and external speakers

Title: Girton College Table Top Role Playing Society
